class.name: minestar.mine.domain.minemodel.underground.operatingstatus.ChuteHazardStatusImpl
class.meta: A site-configurable value to describe the hazard level of chutes in the haulage level of underground mines..

property.name: active
property.meta: Whether this status is active or archived. (This flag is '1' if it is active and '0' if archived.)

property.name: name
property.meta: The short, coded textual representation of this status.

property.name: comments
property.meta: Additional user comments on this status.

property.name: displayColorRed
property.meta: The red value of the background color used to represent this status.

property.name: displayColorGreen
property.meta: The green value of the background color used to represent this status.

property.name: displayColorBlue
property.meta: The blue value of the background color used to represent this status.
